channel.description: Recent content in Project_euler on Benjamin's Blog

item.title: Project Euler Solutions in R and Python
item.description: Mathedemo MathJax.Hub.Config({tex2jax: {inlineMath: [['$','$'], ['\\(','\\)']]}}); The Devil is in the Data website presents solutions to Project Euler problems in R. Project Euler (named after Swiss mathematician Leonhard Euler) is a competition with computational problems. Participants solve these problems using computer code, using many different languages. This blog was inspired by Devil is in the Data and tries to provide detailed solution in both R and Python to a Euler problem per week.
